name: Christ Carrying the Cross (recto); The Resurrection (verso)
description: Christ Carrying the Cross (recto); The Resurrection (verso); Sodoma (Giovanni Antonio Bazzi) (Italian, 1477 - 1549); Italy; about 1535; Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, heightened with white gouache, over black chalk on brownish paper (recto); brush and brown ink and white gouache heightening (verso); 18.7 x 21.4 cm (7 3/8 x 8 7/16 in.); 86.GA.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
